title: Fundamentals of carrier telephony. Pt 1.  Principles and applications
brief_description: Explains the use of carrier telephoning to increase the number of telephone channels on a single wire without the extra cost of wires etc. Using diagrams it shows how four voices can use the same wires without interference to each user.
